overview: Against a white wall with a modern sculpture of silver and gray curves, between yellow panels with black sconces, on a white bed with a black wooden headboard cut into alternating blocks of parallel lines, Dado Diddone (shaved head, stubble, hoop earrings, line of black script across shoulder blades) sucks Renzo Mazime (close-cut black hair, huge muscles, outline tattoos over upper right arm and left chest and shoulder); they 69; Dado sits on Renzo; Renzo tops Dado sideways.
title: DILF Adventures 2
